name: Ancient Spirit Stims

items.alias: Sample of a chemical based compound
Sample of a fire based compound
Sample of a cold based compound

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Ancient Spirit Purge helps get rid of debuffs. The Ancient Spirit Remedy will heal both your health and nano. All of the parts drop from Albtraum #L "Ancient Medical Device" "267736" Note:To build your Ancient Medical Device, go here: #L "Ancient Medical Device" "/tell recipe 598" #L "Acid Gland Sample" "267743" #L "Fire Gland Sample" "267741" #L "Frost Gland Sample" "267742" #L "Radioactive Gland Sample" "267744" #L "Venom Gland Sample" "267745" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Ancient Medical Device + Acid Gland Sample = #L "Sample of a chemical based compound" "267732" Skills: | PT 1750 | Ancient Medical Device + Fire Gland Sample = #L "Sample of a fire based compound" "267730" Skills: | PT 1750 | Ancient Medical Device + Frost Gland Sample = #L "Sample of a cold based compound" "267731" Skills: | PT 1750 | Ancient Medical Device + Radioactive Gland Sample = #L "Sample of a radioactive based compound" "267733" Skills: | PT 1750 | Ancient Medical Device + Venom Gland Sample = #L "Sample of a poisonous based compound" "267734" Skills: | PT 1750 | ------------------------------ Ancient Spirit Purge ------------------------------ Sample of a fire based compound + Sample of a cold based compound = #L "Combined Bio Samples - Stage One" "267774" Skills: | 5.5 x QL in PT | Combined Bio Samples - Stage One + Sample of a chemical based compound = #L "Combined Bio Samples - Stage Two" "267775" Skills: | 5.5 x QL in PT | Combined Bio Samples - Stage Two + Sample of a radioactive based compound = #L "Combined Bio Samples - Stage Three" "267776" Skills: | 5.5 x QL in PT | Ancient Medical Device + Combined Bio Samples - Stage Three = #L "Ancient Spirit Purge" "267793" Skills: | 5.5 x QL in PT | ------------------------------ Ancient Spirit Remedy ------------------------------ Combined Bio Samples - Stage Three + Sample of a radioactive based compound = #L "Combined Bio Samples - Stage Four" "267777" Skills: | 6 x QL in PT | Ancient Medical Device + Combined Bio Samples - Stage Four = #L "Ancient Spirit Purge" "267773" Skills: | 6 x QL in PT |
